group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...
So you think this candy shop might be a trigger@for her to remember?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I feel like there's a connection to what@we're forgetting...

group_1.textLeft: As expected, I'm getting kinda nervous...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, you never know what you'll remember...

group_1.textLeft: Nah, not that, it's because it's been ages since@I've seen Grams.
I don't know why I've kept away from her...
Anyway, can't you just think about it after you@remember?

group_1.textRight: You write it off like it's nothing...
Granny! I want this, and one more raffle ticket!

group_1.textLeft: You're always drawing lots. You'll never become@a proper grown-up like that, you hear?

group_1.textRight: But come on, you never know what you're@gonna get! Isn't it so exciting?

group_1.textLeft: I can already see it...
Okay, the prizes are on the shelf, so feel free@to pull them out and take them.

group_1.textRight: 'Kaaay.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:801400:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: Ahh... Long time no see, Grams.

group_1.textLeft: Well, if it isn't Jun.

group_1.textRight: Hey, what the heck? You were concerned about me,@weren't you?
Umm...

group_1.textLeft: I see, so you two brought her here.
I'm sorry, I'm not actually upset at you.
It's only natural for you to stop coming when@you get to high school.

group_1.textRight: But to me, the Tomorrow Shop is a utopia.
Truth is, I've wanted to start coming here again@since I got back to Kamihama.
Not just pop in to say hi.

group_1.textLeft: Then, why didn't you?

group_1.textRight: Well, I couldn't. I felt like there was a reason@I shouldn't...

group_1.textLeft: You say the oddest things.
But, well, I'll let it be water under the bridge@that you didn't show up.
You brought me all these customers, after all.
Oh my gosh, I totally haven't had one of these@since I was in third grade.

group_1.textCenter: I never thought you'd eat stuff like dried squid,@Princess.

group_1.textLeft: T-B-H, it seriously reeks.
But it's been such a long time, so it's@totally okay to have some again!
Jun, you should show the young lady there@what you'd recommend.

group_1.textRight: Can't be helped. Guess I'll teach this@candy shop newbie a thing or two.
And while we're at it, play some beigoma,@since it's been ages.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, by the way, Jun.

group_1.textRight: Hm?

group_1.textLeft: Have you seen that girl? You know, from@about two years ago...
Before you moved away from Kamihama, wasn't@there a girl who used to come with you?
She hasn't come by either, ever since you left...

group_1.textRight: ...Who was that...?

group_1.textLeft: Oh?

group_1.textRight: Woah, no way! Big sis Jun?!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, you've gotten so big!

group_1.textRight: I'm already a first-year in middle school!@So, you came back!
Have you seen big sis Mitsune?!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.narration: How could I have forgotten about someone@so important to me...?!

group_1.textCenter: Mitsune Miwa... When did she disappear from@my memories...?

group_1.textLeft: Mitsune...

group_1.textRight: ...Miwa...

group_1.textLeft: Really, when did she...
Jun...?

group_1.textRight: Did I say something weird?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, it's my bad, you didn't say anything weird.
Sorry, Grams, I gotta go take care of something.
I hope she isn't caught up in anything strange.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, big sis Jun certainly sure gets up to@crazy stuff.

group_1.textLeft: Jun's not the only one.
While I watch over you kids, I notice that@every now and then...
There's some who mysteriously disappear...
I knew something was strange...
I wasn't the one trying to change...
It was Mitsune...!

group_1.textRight: Jun...
Then, when you said you were missing something...
Was it Mitsune...?

group_1.textLeft: Nope, I didn't fulfill the condition to go to@the Tomorrow Shop...
I set a condition against going to the@Tomorrow Shop until Mitsune could change.
I included myself in that restriction, too...!
Why did this happen...@Where did Mitsune disappear to...?!
Since you figured out that much, let this cutie@refresh your memory.

group_1.textRight: Princess...?

group_1.textLeft: Everyone finally remembered Miwarin.
